body:
Hi,

I just waited 6 months to being unbaned from this server because users and staff were saying me "wait until you get an answer" and I am very jaded of waiting. I got banned because a Moderator thought I was hacking, and I wasn't hacking.
After all, I hate hacking and specially in this game of blocks, minecraft is the easiest game over the world. So please unban me, I like a lot this server. I am on this server since the name was "SkyWars" and the Hub was very very little.

Greetings and Thanks,

meteogold

title: Unfair

replies.body:
Email support to appeal your ban.
support@avicus.net
